query:
SELECT DISTINCT
            c.email_address as "email_address!"
        FROM
            email_messages m
        JOIN
            email_message_recipients mr ON m.id = mr.message_id
        JOIN
            email_contacts c ON mr.contact_id = c.id
        WHERE
            m.link_id = $1
            AND m.is_sent = TRUE
            AND mr.contact_id IS NOT NULL
        ORDER BY
            c.email_address
